name: RenalInsufficiency
title: Renal insufficiency
description: OP-13 is the measure ID associated with the codes.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains ICD-9 codes associated with renal insufficiency.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have renal insufficiency.),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-9 codes associated with renal insufficiency are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Values that are not related to renal insufficiency, or those captured in systems other than ICD-9, are excluded from the value set.)
